I agree with Joonasd6 that the core of this is the mindbreak aspect. That’s what I hate about this story. A woman who chooses to be a slut is really hot. Take choice away and what’s left is a mindless whore — not for me. The format of rape > discover she’s an M > nothing else matters but big dicks takes a lot work to be believable. This one takes the shortcut instead, replacing it with “and magic happens”. What’s left is a dangerous narrative that dehumanizes women.

Our brains model the world as narratives. Repeat a narrative enough and it gets hard-coded as a permanent pattern — learned. A few people act it out. The truth is, there are people on the ‘net who believe the narrative. Rapes have been broadcast on the Web. Not too long ago in India a girl was kidnapped and gang raped for days. Along with horror, anger, and sympathy does it also excite? Do you wonder what it looked like and how her body responded?

This NTR is fantasy but I don’t think it’s 100% harmless.
